showerReviews.reviewText: Yet again I fill up at a pilot and later the same week I get told I dont have a shower credit. Im done with using pilot/flying j, they screw you out of credits to get more money
Small little flying j . Not enough parking . Fuel islands are also little . Kind of express truck stop . Liked there shower and cleanliness.  Smiling friendly chick's

Heard over the intercom no wait for a shower get a nice warm shower. I buy a shower cuz no wait. Get to my shower and no towels. Told me it was a 20 min wait for towels cuz  shower person was  elsewhere‚Ä¶ customers not first????? Lazy ‚Ä¶

This is the nastiest laziest pilot I ever be been 2 hair still on the grown in showers no soap for the shower I was next in line had number pop up and everything and still took an hour night shift is sad!!! Management needs to change

The shower was GREAT! The parking lot was crowded! Fuel is reasonable price! Store was clean with lots of selection. Bathrooms were clean and drivers room didn't have any homeless people hanging out! It was REALLY good!
10.28.2022 Cleen shower, Truck care shop nearby.  Driver lounge available.
Over 2 hours wait for a damn shower all showers open waiting to get cleaned

Trukstop is like a trash heap! Disgusting service, shower impossible. Showers are empty but not cleaned.
Employees are like sleepy flies.

‚Ä¶ or extremely slow, where it can take 30 minutes to fuel up. When I take a shower, the person inside that cleans the bathrooms, will clean multiple showers at the same time. Which leaves me having to wait for 30 minutes, when it could have ‚Ä¶

1 hour 15 min waiting for a shower . Showers empty waiting in somebody to clean it . Staff are very very slow . I‚Äôm surprised some people really need to work and want to do the job but management get always the slowest person in the entire ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Please wash or Replace your shower curtains in #3. Disgusting! Plz empty trash can after each customer and wash the can when it looks like this. Only half that trash is mine. Faucet needs a tune up. ‚Ä¶
Gas, food, bathrooms and a shower! Great place to recharge before getting back on the road!

‚Ä¶ sandwich while I was here. They've got everything under the sun here, all you could ever need all under one roof. You can even get a hot shower here if you wanted. The employees are always extremely nice and helpful. Stop by, 5‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ is social hour for there religious employees who at the same time are yelling and swearing....they don't clean there showers yet the manager is overheard praising the person who cleans them "I need you to do another great job at cleaning ‚Ä¶

Stopped here to shower and fuel. Parking lot needs to be expanded and cleaned up. Staff is friendly and helpful. Subway is always hoppin. Showers are well designed...nice to see attention to special needs. Only reason they didn't get a 5 ‚Ä¶
I dont usually stop at Loves because theres always a wait to shower. But this 1 was great

Very clean and nice employees who dont like lines lol they will call everyone they have to hurry and get u checked out! Showers were nice too, I was in shower #2 it had a little leak but I just put the rag provided over it since I bring my ‚Ä¶

This place doesn‚Äôt have AC inside the showers! It‚Äôs terrible when taking a shower! It‚Äôs like being inside an oven! When asking the cashier: do you know the AC in the showers is not working‚Äù ‚Ä¶

went to get a shower and had to wait. so stepped into the restroom for a minute and when I came out they had skipped my number. i waited 2 hrs for a shower. the customer service at this stop stinks worse than their bathrooms. worst loves ‚Ä¶
Always really friendly.  They have a Subway Sandwich shop and a nice travel store. You can even pay a little bit and take a shower if you are on the road and need a break.

showerReviews.reviewText: My first time here, only good for parking(if trains dont bother your sleep). And maybe a shower but everything else...nope. Idk why people are saying the food is good bc it's NOT. I waited 25 min for fried out the bag frozen zucchini and ‚Ä¶

6am. Walked in for a shower.  Someone hired theirs smart ass little son to run the register.  He all but laughed when telling me the showers wouldn't be ready from 10 to 20 minutes.  I stood there 15 minutes and neither of the three people ‚Ä¶

Was told shower are available, when came in all were in use, and would be 10 min wait.  35 min later was told I could take a shower that has not been cleaned or come back later as it was going to be 40 to 45 more minutes.  Not happy and ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ had to work over the road this Thanksgiving.  I went with him and we stopped here for the night to park and sleep.  I went in in the morning to pay for a shower.  The cashier was not very friendly.  I went into the shower room and it was ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ .  Self absorbed waitress forgot 2 of the 3 items I ordered and never cracked a smile till she left the bill. Shower looked and felt like a disease ridden telephone booth that Superman would use if he were strung out on crack. The ‚Ä¶

I've bought fuel here for years i filled up today  75 gal is all it took  and still going to  charge me for a shower i will never buy fuel here again i told the guy at the fuel desk all he said he didn't care
The fat lady refused me a free shower even tho I bought 87 gallons of fuel plus $12 worth of def & spent money in their store & restaurant. I won't ever be stopping here again !!!

Lots of parking,  Friendly folks at the cash register and in the restaurant.
Good fuel prices good food.
Always fuel up and get a shower and a lunch on my way out west.

Could use some major updating but to be fair that is actually in process. Restaurant always good with true truck stop feel and service. Lots of parking friendly staff. 3 stars die to condition of current restroom and shower facilities.

showerReviews.reviewText: Not a bad little spot to park with the truck overnight. They have 1 shower room, normally priced. The gal and young man were very nice. The young man working early the next morning was very nice as well. Grabbed my coffee and hit the road.
First time there I wanted a shower the gal was sheepish and said they don't have towels. (Theft.) But sold me a shower anyway. ‚Ä¶
Water was out at home so I used the shower. Shower was clean and inexpensive compared to other truck stops. The lady cashier was awesome and super friendly.

Just got a cefco reward card fueled up and they would not give me a shower because card is not registered and can only register from 0800-1700 I guess smaller stops are getting like the larger ones.so don't expect to get a free shower with ‚Ä¶

Got in about 10/11 pm. NEEDED a shower, unavailable because there was only one person running the place, and no one to clean them.  Needed a drink, no tea and no straws. This is the second day in a row I‚Äôve stayed at CEFCO and only one ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: This is the cutest clean gas station/truck stop ~ with friendly employees ~ the shower/bathroom area is clean and spacious ~ the bbq ribs is a must

Stopped for diesel and a shower at around 0500.  Pumps Do not work properly and the employees who you have to hunt for assure you its your fault. After 40 mins of trying to fuel I gave up. Parked and headed in for a shower that looked like ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ 2 showers for $12 ‚Ä¶

Friendly staff good BBQ. However the shower valve was shot so you can't turn it off completely and the counter in the men's room was covered with calking because they don't seem to want to pay for professionals to fix it.

‚Ä¶ on it. The shower floods when you take a shower I was standing in 3 inches of water because the drains don‚Äôt work, when you walk in the building, there is more flies than at a cattle farm biting the hell out of you. There is rust ‚Ä¶

I understand & appreciate the hard work but, they have to pay more attention on cleaning the showers.

Lot of hair on shower, I had to cleaning to take a decent bath.

Really bad drain on sink.

If you want to enjoy a shower, this is not the place. No hot water, dirty, unpleasant smell. We changed the shower, but the situation did not improve! The worker said she would clean up, but that didn't happen! Please avoid. The store ‚Ä¶

For truckers: do not shower here. Worst shower ever: sharp mildew smell, massive flooding over the entire floor, extreme water temp changes, no soap in the shower stall, broke fan, and you can‚Äôt use your pilot shower credits. Will never ‚Ä¶
Food was not fresh.  Will not go back. Shower water was running out of the shower into the store before I could finish my shower. I couldn't even dry my feet it was so bad.

This place has majorly gone down hill since being converted to a pilot. Don't even bother with a shower here. Both are in terrible condition and management blames it on the property owners. It's been like that for a very long time now. Whoe ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Unlike all other truck stops, even if you get fuel here, you still have to pay for a shower. $20 for a shower and an additional $5 for a team shower, so total $25 to shower after just putting about 100 gallons in the tanks. You get one body ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ fueling. I guess if you're looking at the retail price it's okay but if you want to use the points that you earn with your pilot card here you're better going somewhere else because you can't use it for anything except for a damn shower.
